suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Parque Europa - Los Pitufos, Pinto', 'title': 'Flat'}
description: CHANCE!. Newly renovated apartment, BRAND NEW, located in one of the best areas of Pinto. Surrounded by all the necessary services to have an unbeatable quality of life. The house is rent-free, and has an elevator, parking space, storage room and garden area. One of the highlights of this property is its luminosity. The presence of natural light in every corner of the apartment creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere, which contributes to a feeling of spaciousness and well-being. This aspect is reinforced by the inclusion of a community garden, a green space that not only beautifies the environment, but also provides the possibility of enjoying moments outdoors without leaving home. DISTRIBUTION: Lobby-hall. Kitchen. Spacious living room. Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom with shower. Two more bedrooms. A full bathroom with a shower tray to serve these two bedrooms. FEATURES: - Natural gas heating. - Elevator. - Physical goalkeeper. - Garage - Storage room. - Aluminum windows. - Updated plumbing and electrical. - Air conditioning in living room and two bedrooms. NO AGENCY COMMISSION Regarding the location in Pinto, it is worth highlighting the benefits of living in this area. Pinto is characterized by being a municipality with an excellent connection to Madrid, which makes daily travel easier for those who work in the capital. In addition, it has a wide range of services, shops and educational centers, which makes it an ideal option for families. The presence of nearby parks, green areas and leisure services adds an additional quality of life component. Pinto is distinguished by its calm and pleasant atmosphere, away from the hustle and bustle of the big city, making it an ideal place for those seeking a balance between urban life and the tranquility of a residential environment. In summary, this apartment in Pinto not only stands out for its internal features and amenities, but also for the quality of life that its location offers. With a combination of modernity, luminosity, nearby services and a pleasant environment, this property is presented as an attractive option for those looking for a home that meets all their expectations and more.

description: REF. 2228/26. Home FOR SALE in Pinto, Travesía de San Ildefonso, being local and the use as a home has been changed means that it will be completely remodeled, with all its brand new facilities and qualities, We have all hated to talk about premises converted to housing. description: This home belongs to a small, recently built residential area, located in Tenería II; With only 17 neighbors, it has a large garden area and community pool. We enter through a charming entrance hall with a built-in wardrobe that leads to a large area that unites the living room, dining room and kitchen (with a closed clothesline). From the living room we go to a 27 meter glazed terrace to enjoy all year round. The house is completed by two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes (10'50m + 10'50m), a bathroom with a bathtub and the master bedroom (15m) with a double built-in wardrobe and a bathroom with a shower and double sink. It is worth highlighting the unbeatable condition, the quality and the improvements added by the owners: white lacquered carpentry, porcelain stoneware, natural gas underfloor heating with independent thermostats in each room, mosquito nets, air conditioning, tiling in the kitchen and bathrooms.. . Includes two parking spaces and a storage room. For more information make an appointment at PQCentro.

description: Beautiful and cozy duplex for sale in a quiet, pedestrian area of Pinto. This bright penthouse has large windows that allow you to enjoy wonderful natural light and views of Plaza Ocho de Marzo. Surrounded by trees and parks, this home offers guaranteed privacy. Inside, we find a built-in wardrobe at the entrance, a full bathroom with a bathtub, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a large window, a living room with two large windows and a separate kitchen. On the upper floor, there is a 32m2 open terrace and an open clothesline. In addition, there is the possibility of putting a wooden house for another additional room. The building has 3 neighbors per floor. Don't miss the opportunity to acquire this your new home in Pinto! Contact us to organize a visit. Reference Santa Florentina - Pinto 200130. Advisor: Kasia.

description: NO COMMISSIONS, fees, or additional costs to the buyer for intermediation. To enter to live without carrying out prior reform. Semi-detached house with 298mc² (according to cadastre) facing south and very bright, consisting of 4 bedrooms, conditioned attic and basement, front and rear patio, interior garage for 2 cars and private pool. It is an ideal home due to its south orientation that gives it a lot of natural light, its large interior space that allows you to have spaces to adapt it to the use that you like most, and its location in the municipality of Pinto, just a few kilometers from Madrid has all the comforts, transport and services. DISTRIBUTION: - Ground floor with entrance hall, large living room, office-type kitchen, guest toilet, paved front patio, rear patio with terrace and private pool. - First floor with 4 bedrooms (all with built-in wardrobes and the main room has a dressing room), 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite with the main room). - Basement currently with living room and kitchen, toilet and garage for 2 cars, it has a very large space that is currently being used as a leisure room, dining room, wine cellar and cinema room with projector, but it can be adapted to an infinite number of uses. - Attic with 1 living room, storage room for storage and ironing room, and solarium terrace. QUALITIES AND INSTALLATIONS: • Aluminum exterior carpentry with double glazing and intermediate chamber (Climalit type) and bars.Interior oak carpentry. • Security system with interior presence and opening detectors on doors and windows. • Underfloor heating system throughout the house except for the garage and instant Natural Gas DHW. • Inverter type air conditioning, with heat pump. • High quality stoneware flooring on the ground floor and flooring in the living room, first floor and attic.

description: Located in the heart of the city, NOVAPINTO will have 137 homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, all of them with a terrace or private garden and common areas with more than 3,000 m2 of garden areas, swimming pool, children's games, gym and neighborhood room.A modern architecture project that will respond to the current demand of the municipality, will connect the historic center and enhance the surrounding neighborhoods. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro - Ayuntamiento, Pinto', 'title': 'Flat in Calle del Parque Éboli'}
description: ! EMPIRE REAL ESTATE PROPERTIES SELLS MAGNIFICENT HOME IN PLAZA EBOLI, PINTO! Welcome to your new home in the heart of Pinto, where elegance and comfort are found in every corner of this completely renovated central apartment. Upon entering, you are enveloped by the feeling of opening a modern and welcoming space. The high-quality gray flooring creates a contemporary and warm atmosphere that flows effortlessly throughout the home, except in the kitchen and bathroom, where practicality is combined with good taste. The kitchen is a dream come true for culinary lovers. The gray silestoné countertop and sink, along with the cabinets meticulously dressed inside with drawers, add a touch of sophistication. The kitchen area, with a wall covered in silestone that matches the countertop, creates a modern and functional environment. The white designer tiles and the stoneware floor imitating the platform complete this kitchen that combines style and functionality perfectly. The bathroom is an oasis of tranquility and modernity. The slate resin shower, mirrored glass screen and black glass sink add a touch of contemporary luxury. With the stoneware floor, this space becomes an elegant and relaxing refuge. The rooms are not far behind in terms of design and comfort. White closets dressed inside provide an organized and functional space. The living room and the main room are places where you will feel comfortable and relaxed. The air conditioning and heat pump ensure a perfect climate in any season of the year. In addition, the motorized blinds in the living room offer modern comfort with the possibility of being domotized. The location of this home is unbeatable. Just one minute from the Renfe station, buses and supermarkets, convenience meets luxury. The east-west orientation guarantees constant luminosity, while the building's renovated façade and roof offers a feeling of security and modernity. In short, this apartment in Pinto is not just a home; It is a refuge where modernity and elegance meet comfort and functionality. Welcome to your new home, where every detail has been carefully designed to offer you the life you have always wanted. COME VISIT YOUR HOME! FINANCING TO YOUR MEASURE. COME VISIT YOUR HOME!
